sen.j: 文武一道（ぶんぶいちどう）とは、文武両道とは異なり、学問も武芸（スポーツ）も詰まるところは同じであるという意である。
sen.e: Bunbu ichido means that both the literary and military (sports) arts are essentially the same, unlike 文武両道 (bunbu ryodo, both the literary and military arts).

sen.e: The word is believed to have been left by Kyuzo MIFUNE-judan (10th-Dan Judo master), a judo practitioner in the early days of The Kodokan Judo Institute famous for creating kuki nage (the air throw).
